text: Tolaba oyo eyawakana ne Ibrahim ku bwomu bwa Katonda we, olwokuba nno bambi Katonda yamuwa obufuzi ekyamuletera okwekuluntaza, Ibrahim bweyamugamba nti Katonda wange yooyo awa obulamu era natta, ye naddamu nti nze mpa obulamu era nenzita, Ibrahim naagamba nti mazima Katonda enjuba agiggya buvanjuba kale ggwe giggye ebugwanjuba. Awo nno omuwakanyi oyo ebigambo nebimuggwako anti bulijjo Katonda talungamya bantu beeyisa bubi
